it's gluten-free, it's dairy free. A beautiful

and pesto

types of nuts

to have some protein because that will fill you up

and these are gonna add a bit of

some thyme and maple syrup and some olive oil

then you need to add a couple of

this is going to help bind your mixture as well

and then the last thing it's just a pinch of

This has all come together now
to form one delicious buttery nutty dough
and this is exactly what you want. You get a sheet of greaseproof paper
Pop it down on your chopping board
Then tip out the galette dough

to form a circle then get another piece of greaseproof paper
So you want to roll it out until it's about half a centimetre thick
